overview: Meeting in a navy recruiting line, Al Crowthers and Melvin Jones become friends. Al has tried to enlist before, but was always rejected. He keeps trying so that he can impress women. Melvin, is allergic to women's cosmetics and his doctor prescribed ocean travel, so he decided to join the navy.
tagline: They go down to the sea in shipsâ€¦ and come up with oceans of LAUGHTER!
title: Sailor Beware
